channel.title: activism on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in activism on My Blog

item.title: Headphones
item.description: Headphones look two lobes one bridge clung to my head, like a hook voices feeble yet sharp as the synth scale, water my barren ear. Blaring from the window, rubble of the morning, the air rustling, leaves singing autumn, fights, protests, and treet shows on roads. incorrigibly lost, my mind is aloof, it’s clinched by Kacey in the midst of “Butterflies” They’re my headphones, just before the first lecture of the day.
